attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for his achievements in football for northern ireland david deserves to recieve the highest honour this little part of the united kingdom can bestow on one of its greatest footballers.
            thank you.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
